name: Rust Development Best Practices
description: Idiomatic Rust with safety and performance
rules: Follow Rust API Guidelines and idiomatic patterns
Use Result<T, E> for all fallible operations, avoid panic! in library code
Implement proper error handling with thiserror or anyhow
Prefer owned types (String) in APIs, &str for internal use
Use builder pattern for complex struct initialization
Leverage type system for compile-time guarantees (newtype pattern)
Document all public APIs with /// doc comments and examples
Use cargo clippy suggestions and fix all warnings
Implement Display and Debug traits for custom types
Prefer iterators over loops, use collect() sparingly
